allData.Transformation Logic: i. For all the filtered SKUs in demand.xlsx - add 4 rows per month for every SKU where the WH column has all 4 GFCM, NFCM, KFCM and X
ii. Map the month numbers from "Base_scenario_configuration / Planning time period"

allData.Column Description: Month  (all months are 1-12 in model regardless of the cycle month)
Make to order demand for a SKU + Warehouse combination for next month
allData.Transformation Logic: i. For every SKU + Warehouse combination - sum the demand in T01 for matching FGSKUCode + Safety Stock WH + Next Month Code where SKU type is MTO

allData.Column Description: Make to stock demand for a SKU + Warehouse combination for next month
allData.Transformation Logic: i. For every SKU + Warehouse combination - sum the demand in T01 for matching FGSKUCode + Safety Stock WH + Next Month Code where SKU type is MTS

allData.Column Description: Inventory days as per inventory policy for a given SKU + WH combination
allData.Transformation Logic: For every FG SKU + Factory combination - lookup inventory days from Capacity.xlsx

allData.Column Description: Make to stock demand for next 3 months for given SKU + WH combination
allData.Transformation Logic: i. For every SKU + Warehouse combination - sum the demand in T01 for matching FGSKUCode + Safety Stock WH + Next Month Code where SKU type is MTS

allData.Column Description: Min. opening stock for a given SKU + WH combination
allData.Transformation Logic: Set 0 for all rows

allData.Column Description: Max. opening stock for a given SKU + WH combination
allData.Transformation Logic: Set as 10^10 for all rows except for where WH  = X

allData.Column Description: Min. closing stock for a given SKU + WH combination
allData.Transformation Logic: Calculate and hardcode the value for each row where

allData.Column Description: Max. closing stock for a given SKU + WH combination
allData.Transformation Logic: Set as 10^10 for all rows except for where WH  = X
Set 1 for all rows

allData.Column Description: First month opening stock for a given FGSKUCode in GFCM (UAE)
allData.Transformation Logic: For every FGSKUCode + GFCM combination - sum the qty on hand from inventory data for GFC where "reporting level" is "SUBINV_LEVEL"

allData.Column Description: First month opening stock for a given FGSKUCode in KFCM (Kuwait)
allData.Transformation Logic: For every FGSKUCode + KFCM combination - sum the qty on hand from inventory data for KFC where "reporting level" is "SUBINV_LEVEL"

allData.Column Description: First month opening stock for a given FGSKUCode in NFCM (KSA)
allData.Transformation Logic: For every FGSKUCode + NFCM combination - sum the qty on hand from inventory data for NFC where "reporting level" is "SUBINV_LEVEL"
Lookup from Item master based on FGSKUCode
Set as 1 for all rows

columns.transformationLogic: i. For every SKU + Warehouse combination - sum the demand in T01 for matching FGSKUCode + Safety Stock WH + Next Month Code where SKU type is MTO
